class_names.description: An array of class names will be predicted.

point_feature_size.description: A number of channels of point feature layer.

max_voxel_size.description: A maximum size of voxel grid.

point_cloud_range.description: An array of distance ranges of each class, this must have same length with `class_names`.

voxel_size.description: An array of voxel grid sizes for PointPainting, this must have same length with `paint_class_names`.

down_sample_factor.description: A scale factor of downsampling points

encoder_in_feature_size.description: A size of encoder input feature channels.

detection_score_thresholds.description: A dictionary of minimum confidence scores for each class and a distance bin upper limits.

distance_bin_upper_limits.description: An array of upper bounds of each distance bin.

min_confidence_scores.description: A dictionary of minimum confidence scores for each class.

CAR.description: A minimum confidence score for CAR in each distance bin.

TRUCK.description: A minimum confidence score for TRUCK in each distance bin.

BUS.description: A minimum confidence score for BUS in each distance bin.

BICYCLE.description: A minimum confidence score for BICYCLE in each distance bin.

PEDESTRIAN.description: A minimum confidence score for PEDESTRIAN in each distance bin.
